title: Strengthening Medical Practical Skills: Analysis of Online Science Learning Knowledge Structures Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific principles and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create concept maps for weekly science topics with at least 80% completeness in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can diagnose their learning level by analyzing knowledge structure types (hub-and-spoke, small-scale network, large-scale network).
Learners can derive at least three strategies to enhance knowledge structure complexity by comparing concept maps with peer learners.
Learners can submit a science problem-solving project report applying knowledge structure analysis techniques in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
